text: paqrastA#daqBi dru#hyatiq nainaqM ~Mvaru#NO gRuhNAtyAqvya#M ~MvA EqSha prati# gRuhNAtiq yO&vi#M pratigRuqhNAti# vaiSvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaqM nirva#pEqdavi#M pratiqgRuhya# saM~MvathsaqrO vA aqgnirvai$SvAnaqraH sa#M~Mvathsaqra-sva#ditAmEqva prati#gRuhNAtiq nA&&*vya#M prati#gRuhNAtyAqtmanOq vA EqSha mAtrA#mApnOtiq ya u#BaqyAda#t pratigRuqhNAtyaSva#M ~MvAq puru#ShaM ~MvA vaiSvAnaqraM dvAda#SakapAlaqM nirva#pEduBaqyAda#t - [  ]  32
